subject: The Power Duo Shaping Ecommerce: Humans and AI

Hi Atto,

Is the future of Ecommerce human?

Athos Commerce’ new playbook GROW 25 The Importance of persona/b, People are People has just launched. The playbook explores how people power modern business — from developers and data architects building the backbone of digital commerce, to marketers, merchandisers, and executives driving growth and innovation.

Discover:

- How people and AI work better together to create seamless, emotionally intelligent product discovery experiences that feel personal at every click
- The science behind pricing decisions, revealing how advanced optimisation uncovers hidden profit opportunities across your catalogue
- Ways to unlock hidden profit through operational efficiency, using strategic cost reduction as a foundation for sustainable retail growth
- Why accessibility is the next frontier of growth, showing how inclusive design enhances brand reputation, customer trust, and commercial performance

And so much more!

Grab your copy now >
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VXbHnf1sMKNWW1NMwBF134bcXW3S9mTt5GhMcpN63y6mdcPmD2W50lYqz6lZ3pjW2PLr1M2H9z8JW1QwG-Q8Q0YjGW2gqhbh4vRbQsN464CMYyJywNW3ymVRV3kJXxKW6RLhYh2Jd-_SN6tMBD7ll4MbVg-m_X5fmsZgW33wzrX23J7pyW7mmfBB5qCXL4W8Sf7vX8p0C5wMkYmFsMDPV2W4DCFJQ4K1_7SW795p5h21GShzW2jP9hK4XYrQ7VF5YsM7SLbTlW2bysfG2dJf69W2mK98n3NRcs3W3PSDv38vXqNCW5t40745MT20RW7Swd6t6w_7rTW3C6nNs31dtnFW7PqLsL3ZzGfRW4259g772RpjCMRRLKHQhNy8MkRD5wyBRDyW59lH092ffsd9W8Spqsw1dLM8MW22YZc363VvZvN3NG8NwC8m6xW87Wy_H1sFD19W5Zm2q09b9P9CW7lqmql6FcJyzW1_K9zF3LcZ8mW2sCCdj8zTrL0W3kxfZ-1mMgb5W6VssmH3C86JdN80tltv5lBPSN5myjZlM3L5TW6nXtlt1H7hMSW7z4qBc71z6h1Mxx65c8mvpTW4yPgBD8vQRcTW6HCjg25K1YkQM4gLcTHw3zrW6qMB7n4fYgj4W6Kl_s71MjNzhW22xBMr2Zq33bW3l_jJm5D_DCwW2YblYB48X2CTW3KTxw-7K_sjdW6tSTKw9fBS0-M-KG-kvmsszW7YGRpb54XRR2M1J1hbqfwbtW87y75865bdFzW8rCgrh2yw3QtW7NbS4Y1y3QnDW1_qqcB5TnNbFN5XqTw6WDdPDN3FgjK2S3pYfMffjXmbvmHsW5TLvQr11Z4w2W11YSkD8WKc8qW96qbKP6zxjQTW5hhvR54k0qW2W5P4_ml479Gm_W2rMz1p2tvdCMW16Vb0d2Knq-HW3XZ3z46pGM1mN2ZhFZQyHKhtW6hbL1c2RF_8kW1SK7cY8sX_4dVT0DD978D1l-N7xNJ2dpcqHvW35jK2j6zqkvWW1fC9-J3c2Ct9V6P1rL50GFcXW5wjfRN7m_S8pMn8230nsG0_f2bL8TH04 )
